title: What's a Realistic Retirement Budget? I'm 66 With $1.1k in a 401(k), Another $80k in Savings and I'll Have $2,800 Social Security
full_text: What's a Realistic Retirement Budget? I'm 66 With $1.1k in a 401(k), Another $80k in Savings and I'll Have $2,800 Social Security. A retirement budget compares expected income with planned expenses to see whether spending fits within available income. This process begins by listing....
